drops.name: Smouldering stone
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Maz|url=https://twitter.com/JagexMaz/status/644582652650110976|date=17 Sep 2015|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/reO3w|archivedate=18 Apr 2019|quote=As promised, I'm home... and you get Cerberus drops... [https://i.imgur.com/yBoDsbT.png]|name=}}

drops.name: Clue scroll (hard)
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>1/32 if a [[Ring of wealth (i)]] is worn and fought in the [[Wilderness]].</ref>{{CiteForum|author=Envision|url=https://archive.fo/5P5mn|title=Drop Rates V2|name=DV2}}

drops.name: Brimstone key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Only dropped if killed on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Konar quo Maten]] (Note: Konar only assigns the 122 variant).</ref>{{CiteTwitter|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/1083781544135847936|author=Mod Kieren|date=16 January 2019|quote=It follows a curve up until level 100 then scales linearly between those 2 values upto level 350 combat. Creatures over thsi{{sic}} will cap at 1/50. [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpdLK2W0AEynZy.jpg]}}

drops.name: Mysterious emblem
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d name=wildytask>Only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/872520473749356549|date=7 June 2017|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/swS9N|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=It's calculated off the HP: 1 in (155 - (HP/2)) There's none with HP over 300, but it'd disregard values higher than that.}}

drops.name: Slayer's enchantment
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d name=wildytask />{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/973892117675298816|date=14 March 2018|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/CWYhV|archivedate=5 June 2019|quote=For nastier bosses (e.g. Callisto) it's 1/30. For other things it scales between 1/320 and 1/80 as the NPC's HP scales from 0 to 300.}}
